title.rendered: AFN LOOPLESS BULLBAR – FORD RANGER PXII (2015 – 2017)

content.rendered:
AFN LOOPLESS BULLBAR TO SUIT FORD RANGER PXII (2015 – 2017)

AFN loopless bullbar to suit Ford Ranger PXII (2015 – 2017) available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The pictured bullbar features;

  • Full Bumper Replacement
  • Rated Recovery Points
  • Winch Compatible
  • Hi-Lift Jack Points
  • Fog/Indicator Light Assemblies
  • Matte Black Powder Coated

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

To view the range of products available for your Ford Ranger, CLICK HERE!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
